email.description: Email, but not validated as data from Supaglue has invalid emails for now

name.description: The name of the account to upsert on. Supported for Outreach, Salesloft, and Apollo.

domain.description: The domain of the account to upsert on. Only supported for Outreach and Salesloft.

email.description: Contact email to upsert on. Supported for Outreach, Salesloft, and Apollo.

key.description: The key to upsert on. Only `website` is supported for Salesforce, while both `domain` and `website` are supported for Hubspot.

values.description: The values to upsert on. If more than one value is provided, it will act as a logical OR. If more than one account is found that matches, then an error will be thrown.

key.description: The key to upsert on. Only `email` is supported for all providers.

values.description: The values to upsert on. If more than one value is provided, it will act as a logical OR. If more than one record is found that matches, then an error will be thrown.

suggested_key_name.description: The underlying provider may change this (e.g. adding `__c` for Salesforce).

issues.description: An array of issues that were responsible for the error

email.description: Email, but not validated as data from Supaglue has invalid emails for now

issues.description: An array of issues that were responsible for the error
An array of issues that were responsible for the error

auto_start_on_connection.description: If true, the sync will start automatically when the connection is created.

id.description: The machine name of the property as it appears in the third-party Provider. In Salesforce, this must end with `__c`.

label.description: The human-readable name of the property as provided by the third-party Provider.

is_required.description: Whether or not this field is required. Must be false for Salesforce boolean fields.

default_value.description: The default value for the property. Only supported for Salesforce.

group_name.description: Only applicable for Hubspot. If specified, Supaglue will attempt to attach the field to this group if it exists, or create it if it doesn't.

precision.description: Only applicable in Salesforce. If not given, will default to 18.

scale.description: Only applicable in Salesforce. If not given, will default to 0.

options.description: The list of options for a picklist/multipicklist field.

raw_details.description: The raw details of the property as provided by the third-party Provider, if available.

crm.meta.property_type.description:
:::note
`picklist` and `multipicklist` property types are currently only supported in Salesforce and Hubspot
:::

:::note
`url` property type currently is only natively supported in Salesforce.
:::

id.description: The machine name of the property as it appears in the third-party Provider

label.description: The human-readable name of the property as provided by the third-party Provider.

type.description: The type of the property as provided by the third-party Provider. These types are not unified by Supaglue. For Intercom, this is string, integer, boolean, or object. For Outreach, this is integer, boolean, number, array, or string.

raw_details.description: The raw details of the property as provided by the third-party Provider, if available.
